songs.title: Broken Cities
songs.lyrics:
You’ll never know
You’ll never know
Until you try
You’ll never know
You’ll never know
Until you try

[Chorus]
I came along from a broken city
So I know one when I see one
I came along from a broken city
Yes I know on when I see one

I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell
I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell
I can tell... That you were born to be alive

So…

You’ll never know
Trust me baby no… no, no, no...
And all I can do is just try to convince you but no… no, no..

[Chorus]
If you came along from a broken city
You would know one when you saw one
If you came along from a broken city
You would recognize…

I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell
I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell, I can tell
I can tell... That you were born to be alive

So, don’t let the fires up ahead burn you down
